Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Deep, ruby red with hints of purple clean, intense, with aromas of blackberry, cherry and red plums, anise and spice, and orange peel fresh and fruity, medium-bodied, well balanced, with a nice structure, juicy acidity and a long finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright ruby red in color. Ripe cranberry, sweet cinnamon and fresh cherry create an inviting bouquet, with a subtle earthiness.The palate shows texture and weight with firm acidity that carries the flavor through. The flavor profile shows red plum, bright cherry, minerality, dusty earth, and a hint of sweet tobacco, creating rustic layers of flavor with soft refined tannins.

Name: Reserve Winemaker's Selection Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mirabai Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Berardenga Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Deep, attractive ruby red colour. Elegantly fruity nose, with marked scents of wild red berries foregrounding nuances of mixed spices. The palate, too, shows excellent fruit supported by judicious tannins. Lengthy finish.

Name: Impression Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A deep, heavy red wine with ripe and bountiful fruit flavors of raspberry and plum, interwoven with scents of vanilla, mint and clove that comes from the wood. It has a full body and an appealing combination of acidity, bitterness, sweetness and subtlety,

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Diamond Collection Claret
Wine Description: Rich and aromatic, our Claret boasts beautiful extraction, velvety tannins, and robust character. Exotic spices and earthy nuances embellish dark, complex fruit flavors that are long-lived on the finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: A wine of complexity and understated elegance. Though subtle and silky around the edges, this wine has a body of concentration and substance. Bright summer cherries greet the nose and palate, while touches of tea and rich red fruit are mouth-filling and lingering. The finish, reinforced by smooth, assertive tannins, hints of toasty oak and spice.

Name: Darkness Red Blend
Wine Description: Our Hand-Crafted artisan blend reveals ripe flavors of raspberry and blackberry with notes of spice and vanilla. Enjoy the darkness.

Name: Zmora Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Vibrant purple colour, soft texture and a perceived sweetness, with fresh berry, cherry and floral aromas.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: An elegant wine with well integrated oak and silky tannins. Sweet notes of dark fruit and vanilla are met with flavors of toast and tea in the mid palate. Essences of layered spice, clove and pepper.

Name: Dinotte Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Grand Assemblage Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright garnet Bold, red, berry fruits, subtle vanilla, rose and tobacco spice Medium body, fine tannins, fresh acid Fresh raspberry, cranberry and pomegranate, support from red currant and cherry

Name: SK (Sidekick) Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Collection Select Red Blend
Wine Description: Very deep, bright, shiny ruby red colour; pronounced fruity nose. The combination of different varieties creates an interesting mix of aromas and flavours. Smooth, harmonic palate with hints of cherry and blackberry, velvety tannins; well-balanced structure with slight residual sugar.

Name: Antichi Giochi Piemontesi Voület Casorzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Napa Valley Merlot
Wine Description: Aromatic, with vibrant red fruit layers of Rainier cherry and spiced plum, as well as notes of liquorice, tobacco leaf, cardamom and thyme. Hints of cedar, leather and savory spice from ageing in French oak barrels contribute depth and nuance, while a streak of uplifting acidity adds dimension to this wine's smooth velvety texture. Dusty tannins frame a sophisticated finish.

Name: Rioja Crianza
Wine Description: This Beronia Crianza shows an intense cherry colour. Attractive nose with red fruits and floral aromas in perfect harmony with mineral and cocoa notes. A balanced and sweet palate with the fruit standing out over a base of chocolate and coffee from the time spent in American oak.

Name: Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has complex wine features the perfect pairing of intriguing bright red fruit avors with dense earth tones. Once open, its aroma, color and avors are sure to entice your tastebuds. vivid and bold wine enriched with full tannins, aromas of ripe red berries and earthy gs; and a color that is vibrant and deep.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Saint-Joseph
Wine Description: Visual : Dark red with violet highlights. Odor : Powerful nose with dominant red fruit and delicate oak aromas. Palate : The palate is fresh and fruity. The rather round and supple tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir

Name: Jeunesse Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Youthful nose of fresh berries, cherry and floral aromas, finishing with a soft texture and a hint of sweetness.

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)

Name: Crianza Rioja
Wine Description: Intense red cherry colour. Aromas of red fruits, strawberry, raspberry and cranberry framed by fine nuances of vanilla and toffee. Silky and structured on the palate, it has a long lasting and satisfying finish.

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir Reserva
Wine Description: Deep and intense ruby color, ripe and aromatic. A fine and elegant wine with well- balanced levels of alcohol and acidity thanks to a year of slow ripening. Flavors of black cherries, strawberries, and raspberries, with a powerful, sweet nose. Lingering, flavorful finish with velvety, gentle and ripe tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has voluptuous, sleek tannins and lush fruit with aromas and flavors of violet, black cherry and plum with hints of toasted oak, cigar box, earth and spice.

Name: Salmos
Wine Description: Dark ruby red. Rich, ripe wine with floral (confected rose) and fruit (dark cherries, prunes) aromas. Beautifully framed by French oak. Elegant, subtle mid palate, very finely structured tannins and a slight touch of toast (cocoa).

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine have red ruby colour and aromas of red fruits like strawberries and fresh plums. On the palate this wine is soft and round tannins, easy to ues and plesant persistence.

Name: Franc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Trinità Roero Riserva
Wine Description: Color: ruby red with orange tints Perfume: dried rose, spices, black fruits and mint Flavor profile: dark fruits and strawberry preserves, tobacco, spices. Elegant and persistent with well balanced tannins

Name: Il Musmeci Riserva Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Deep ruby-red in color, exuberant notes of smoky minerality and red fruits complement undertones of spices, black cherry, and violets. On the palate, it is rich and textural, with well-integrated tannins and a long, evolving finish.

Name: Régnié
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Langhe Nebbiolo
Wine Description: Ruby red, delicate and at times transparent. Intense expressive aromas of violets, withered roses layered over small red berry notes. Silky tannins envelop the palate with personality and vivacious energy.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep red wine with blackish hues. On the nose it has blackberry and black pepper notes with red jam, spices and smoky notes on the palate. A nicely structured red with supple tannins and a pleasant lingering finish.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Opens with aromas of blueberry, subtle spice and rose petals with hints of cocoa. Balanced in style, this wine is structured and lively.

Name: Valpolicella
Wine Description: Well-structured wine, with a soft, long and persistent finish rilliant ruby red in colour, with a pleasant scent of wild berries.Dry and velvety on the palate, it is characterized by a bitter almond finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: San Valentín Garnacha
Wine Description: Dark cherry colour with the violet gleam of a young wine. Attractive and intense aroma reminiscent of blackberry jam, with flowery hints of violets and roses. Smooth, silky and fruity palate (blackberry and pomegranate), with very soft tannins that evolve into a pleasant finish.

Name: Malbec Reserve

Name: Reserve Tempranillo
Wine Description: It has currant, tobacco/coffee with mineral and oak

Name: Réserve du Château Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: Very ripe on the nose, fleshy and wonderfully intense, revealing roasted, mocha notes. This wine is generous on the palate, well-balanced with fine and rounded tannins which are evident but not at all aggressive. It is concentrated with a hint of freshness on the finish.

It is delicious!

Wine Description: Violet robe colour aromas of black and red fruits, accompanied by a touch of gentian. A tasty mouth, beautiful composition, where everything is melted. A delight.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon - Tempranillo
Wine Description: Red purple color, and displays raspberry and blackberry flavors on the palate. it has a medium body and the raspberry is very prominent. about the wine was dry and sucked the moisture from his salivary glands. the medium finish and its slightly abrasive texture. Silky in texture with a superb finish.

Name: Bin 28 Shiraz
Wine Description: The nose is complex and beguiling, with notes of demi-glace and roasting pan juices, beneath scents of pipe tobacco, vanilla and pencil shavings oak - much more than just a simple varietal offering. The palate is full-bodied, refined and taut showing dark, black conserve fruit flavours.Liqueur chocolate and spice flavours are impregnated by overt, chewy and ripe tannins.

Name: Blaufränkisch
Wine Description: This Wine shows deep red with a violet rim. In the nose it shows incredibly fine fruit which remembers of blackberries together with fine spiciness. On the palate the wine shows again deep and spicy berry fruit which is backed up by fine acidity and shows a mineral finish. A elegant, good structured wine with good ageing potential

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: At 14 Hands, our winemaker Keith Kenison takes a practical approach to winemaking—really letting the fruit express itself with as few manipulations as possible. Making wines that people enjoy drinking is the ultimate goal, so many decisions are made throughout the winemaking process based purely on taste. In the end result are wines that are smooth and fruit-forward, yet bold and complex.

Name: Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A wine full of charm: bright ruby colour and a nose rich with aromas of red fruit (raspberry, red currants, wild strawberry). On the palate, the wine is pleasant, fruity and refreshing, with light tannins and great elegance

Name: Monti Garbi Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore

Name: Willamette Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A brilliant core of red and bramble fruits dances with hints of cedar, passion fruit, rose petal, and turned earth. The palate is balanced, with a plush texture and a vibrant, juicy finish.

Name: Valpolicella Il Veronese
Wine Description: Influences of wood compliment the dried fruit on the palate. Medium-bodied with powerful flavors of dried cherry accompanied by vanilla notes. The bold but subtle tannins are balanced by a juicy crispness.

Name: Côte de Nuits-Villages Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Côtes-du-Rhône Rouge
Winery: Domaine de La Bastide - Vincent & Stéphanie Boyer
Wine Description: N/A

Name: La Segreta Il Rosso
Wine Description: An intensely vivid ruby colour. On the nose aromas of redcurrant and mulberry with a slightly spicy and minty finish. In the mouth the wine demonstrates its fine personality with flavours of ripe wild fruits, balanced by a very pleasant full and herbal taste. The tannins are soft and smooth conferring a very versatile character to this red wine.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dark fruit flavors with cherry cola on the entry transition towards tart cranapple and Jolly. Rancher candy before tapering off into a rhubarb pie filling finish.

Name: Campofiorin Rosso Veronese
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pessac-Léognan
Wine Description: Beautiful deep garnet-red colour with a complex, charming bouquet featuring roasted and toasty aromas as well as hints of black fruit and vanilla. Elegant, concentrated, powerful, and well-balanced on the palate. Long aftertaste with remarkably smooth tannin. A great wine with fine ageing potential that will richly reward patience.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: The Prisoner was created and inspired by the drinkable “mixed blacks” first made by the Italian immigrants who originally settled in the Napa Valley. In 2003 The Prisoner was launched and soon became the most recognized innovative and unique Napa Valley Red Wine blend, leading the resurgence of blends by incorporating Zinfandel with the unlikely “mix” of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Petite Sirah, and Charbono. Bold aromas of black cherry and plum are heightened by hints of oak and Madagascar vanilla. A soft and velvety palate of anise, dark cocoa powder and roasted sage lead into a dense finish with luscious tannins.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: This Chianti Classico is a great Tuscan red with concentrated sour cherry fruit flavour, a hint of star anise and super-sleek texture.

Name: Malbec Primeras Viñas
Wine Description: Dark red color with violet hues.Aroma of red fruit and some menthol notes, coconut, vanilla and spices which are added by the oak.Mouth velvety smooth. Unctuous mouth feel but not too rich. Juicy and prolonged. Lingering aftertaste.

Name: Reserva Malbec
Wine Description: Its deep red garnet colour with intense and bright hues is perfectly in tune with his complexe and intense aromas given by bursts red fruits like cherry, and rose hip, followed by elegant notes of lavender. Toasted & tobacco aromas hints at the end reflect its ageing in barrels. A sttrong introduction in mouth with all the smoothness of juicy fruits is combined with structuring and mature tannins. A dominant acidity develops a remarkably long persistency.

Name: Max's Shiraz
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Les Terrasses Laderas de Pizarra
Wine Description: Graceful and harmonious, this red shows good depth, balancing juicy cherry and berry flavors with notes of vanilla, mountain herb and mineral.

Name: D66
Wine Description: Ink black in color with a shade of crimson on the band. Dark dried fruit, cocoa, spring flowers, and Mediterranean herb aromas are framed by seasoned French oak resulting in stunning aromatics. The entry is rich with exotic spice notes of blackberry, licorice, blueberry jam, and espresso.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Intensity tempered by elegance and finesse. A lush, fruity core of ripe blackberry, juicy red and black currant and sweet crème de cassis fleshes out steadily on the palate, interwoven with black currant leaf, mocha and a savory hint of black pepper. There’s a refreshing brightness to the fruit from the beginning all the way through to the lingering, velvety finish.
